title: Here begynneth a shorte and abreue table on the Cronycles ...
author: Higden, Ranulf, d. 1364. Polycronicon. English. Selections.
publicationStmtDate: In the yere of our lorde god. M.CCCCC.xv. [1515]]
publicationStmtPublisher: In powlys chyrche yarde at the west dore of powlys besyde my lorde of londons palays by me Iulyan Notary,
